作者发言:

我和你们一起等待1.6更新，這將是相當的棒，請訂閱我的更新，我要解決我的可怕的語法和在那裡我會添加更多的任務和更大量的開放世界天際的感覺。如果我想的話，我將添加一個新的視頻。由於我的Snowcraft地圖是不那麼受歡迎了，我想我會不更新(这个是我自己翻译的=A=谷歌)I and you have to wait for the 1.6 Update, which is going to be pretty Awesome, please Subscribe for the super big update were i'm going to fix my awful Grammar and where i will add more quests and a lot more open-world Skyrim feeling. If i can or want then i will add a new video too. Since my Snowcraft Map isn't so popular anymore, i think i will not update that 1.

With enough requesting of people then they might going to play it. It would be an honor.This Map has become to the end of the line.

可以請求支持我，我會在這裡把你也許你的支持QuandTh3和Normolus，訂閱他們倆，他們充分發揮我的地圖，2個半小時，謝謝兩位，請點擊這裡进入视频。播放列表是由我，你就可以看到所有的7集“，”警告“，這包含劇透！2的另一個大冒險地圖從Smokeysamcat。這是一個天際地圖--- 請支持我，我的地圖，(←大陸玩家需要翻牆↑)一個讓我們的發揮或分享這個！您可以同時支持Pythros，這種冒險地圖中使用的紋理包的製造商(大陸玩家需要翻牆下載)，檢查他的帖子出來這裡和他的輪廓這裡。支持我告訴他們打我的冒險地圖！的最佳支持。有網站/頻道，並告訴他們這件事，謝謝！--- 新壁紙的免費提供的，看到標籤“圖片” ---可以支持業主的東西，我曾經讓他們出名。您可以使用此橫幅支持我太.. 或一個或使用圖片的圖片包。這裡免費下載。(圖片下載是無效的!所以我沒把連接弄進來) --- 1包中包含圖片。You can Request Support to me and i will put you here maybe.1-Support QuandTh3 and Normolus with Subscribing to them Both, they played my map fully, the 2 and a Half Hour, Thank you both, click HERE to check out. The Playlist made by me, you can then see all the 7 Episodes, Warning, this contains Spoilers!---2-Another Great Adventure Map HERE from Smokeysamcat. It's a Skyrim Map.---Please Support me with My Map, do a let's play or share this!You can also Support Pythros, the maker of the Texture Pack used in this Adventure Map, check his thread out HERE and his profile HERE.Support me by Telling them to Play My Adventure Map!-Best Support.Go to there Site/Channel and tell them About This,Thanks!---
New Wallpaper's available for free, see the Tab ''Pictures''.--- You can Support the Owner's of the Stuff i used to make them Famous.You can Support me too by Using THIS Banner.. or THIS one.Or using 1 of the Picture's in the Picture Pack. Free Download HERE.---1 of the Pictures included in the Pack.  (當中含有無效的或者沒用的連接我就沒有加上去了)





4.jpg (57.36 KB, 下载次数: 28)

下载附件

2013-5-18 13:45 上传




內含劇透(不推薦觀看)如果你玩過我的地圖，那麼我會告訴你將如何繼續。龍裔天際犧牲了自己的生命，5年後.. GreyBear（D）的發現，他的犧牲是為了什麼。後來，GreyBear（D）的約翰被出賣了，在黑暗中觀看，並警告GreyBear（D）的這麼多次，他們不能做到這一點.. 甚至的龍裔失敗，如何能在黑暗中被摧毀，它為什麼這樣結束嗎？地圖？現在。我唯一可以告訴大家，它需要一定的時間，但最終他將返回。為了報仇，並結束這一次和所有的If you played my Map fully, then i will tell you how it will continue. The Dragonborn sacrificed his life for Skyrim, 5 years later.. The GreyBear(d)'s find out that his sacrifice was for nothing. Later on, The GreyBear(d)'s were betrayed by John, The Darkness watched and warned The GreyBear(d)'s so many times, they can't do it.. And even The Dragonborn failed in it, how can The Darkness be destroyed, why is it ending like this? The Map? Now. The only thing i can tell that it will take time, but in the end...He Will Return. To take revenge, and end this once and for all. -





5.jpg (17.15 KB, 下载次数: 18)

下载附件

2013-5-18 13:47 上传




故事是基於原來的遊戲市場上：上古捲軸5：天際。它包含了真實的故事，和自創的故事元素，在“我的地圖”，你扮演年輕，勇敢的龍裔。他的職責是消滅邪惡和黑暗，他表示毫不手軟每一個孽障在天際。當他認為黑暗終於走了..然後他的思想被龍裔wrong.The的倒台已經到來.. 5年後，一組魔術師必須去走天際，黑暗...又回來了。它的考慮世界各地的天際，黑暗的日子傳遞通過，沒有人可以住那裡了，有魔術師的每一個朋友，是所有死.. 他們逃離到其他外形尺寸...所謂：MineRim的，但他們依然並不安全，你只拿到了1剩下的東西在那裡做。考慮..復仇！龍裔，他們必須完成的責任，但是，你會做嗎？，你會生存在黑暗的力量嗎？你能做到不可能的嗎？The Story is Based on the Original Game on the Market: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim. It's contains real story, and self-created story-elements.
In My Map you play as the Young,Brave Dragonborn. His Duty is to Destroy the Evil and the Darkness.

He shows no mercy for every Evil Creature in Skyrim. When he Think that the Darkness is finally gone..Then his thought were wrong.The Dragonborn's Downfall has come.. 5 Years Later, a group of Magician's Must Go away from Skyrim ,the Darkness...IS BACK.It's taking over the World of Skyrim, Dark days pass by, nobody can live there anymore, every friend the Magician's had, are all Dead..
They Flee to a other Demension...Called: MineRim,but they are still not safe there.You got only 1 thing left to do there..Taking..REVENGE!They must complete the duty of the Dragonborn.But, Will you do it?, Will you Survive the Power of the Darkness? Can you do the impossible?





6.jpg (22.38 KB, 下载次数: 11)

下载附件

1請用心守規則的玩地圖，直到結束，結局是非常重要的。1 +上傳到Dropbox的文件，我被禁止或第三次，現在沒有理由的，我用它做。現在的鏈接被壓縮上傳到主人MediaFire FreeFileHosting.net的，(無效連接)--- 2 -一般信息：總遊戲時間超過3小時。最大在線玩家：4。Reccomended難度：普通。：我的一切。沒有他人協助。RECOMEND一起玩：距離遠，安裝Mod的紋理包配。並發揮Bukkit服務器的朋友單獨或與由lRedPosion和其他見標籤“積分”。總工作的努力：7個月以上。（因為我正忙著，我有學校和更多）1-Please be so mean to Play the Map until the End, the Ending is really important.1+-The files i uploaded to Dropbox are banned or the 3rd time now without a reason, I'm done with it. Now the links are compressed and uploaded to Mediafire and FreeFileHosting.net---2-General Information:Total Playtime: Over 3+ Hours.Maximum Players Online: 4.Reccomended Difficulty: Normal.Made by: Me, everything. No Assistance from other People.Recomend to play with: Far Distance, Mod's Installed, Texture Pack Equipped. And to Play Alone or with 1 Friend on a Bukkit Server.Made by lRedPosion and For The Others See the Tab ''Credits''.Total Work of Effort: Over 7 Months. (Because i was Busy, i had School and More)

下載連接(不需要翻牆我已經搬運到百度,不過希望翻譯沒錯誤不必要的文件我沒搬例如：原聲音文件為什麼呢?因為之後有個壓縮當已經包括了所有)OVO的鄉村景象最終版             也不知道翻譯對沒有  Ovo s rustic:redemption+slighty Rdited: The Final Version.zip 上古卷軸V:MineRinm的設置權限?    Permission For The Elder Scrolls V: MineRim: Fall of Skyrim . zip上古卷軸V:修改版3地圖...這個一定沒錯 所以沒原文了
這個存檔包括了所有!!!但不是客戶端所以沒有MOD只是地圖MOD希望有玩家搬運過來吧謝謝=A=   ←下载480M+這已經是400M+了 客戶端不知道要多少呢=A= 所以你懂得 有大大做個整合包最好了 謝謝撒

下载附件

2013-5-18 14:42 上传





1: Download The Map.2: After that,unpack it with Winrar or 7Zip.3: Click on the Map,read and explore and take a look at everything in the Map.4: Minimize,go to run in Start Type in: %appdata% and Hit 'OK'.4+ For Mac,Double click on you're Mac's hard drive icon either on the desktop or in the sidebar of a Finder window. Look for a folder called Applications - this contains your application data.5: Then go inside the save folder inside .minecraft.6: Cut the Save folder from the Folder: The Elder Scrolls V: MineRim-Fall of Skyrim into there and then close the Window. (Save folder to play is called the same as the name of the Map)6+: Install Sonic Ether's Unbelievable Shader Mod. (Optional, good PC is requiered to run the Mod. See HERE for download and info.6++: Install all Mod's with the Links that i delivered in the txt file inside the folder.You are now done,log in,and Play. Have Fun!
意思就是讓你吧地圖放進存檔吧,貌似還要安裝個MOD 不過沒搬運大陸需要翻牆哦...搬運很無語啊 MOD好多啊 MOD我不會搬運 求人搬運到 百度網盤 把地址發給我吧  謝謝

Thank you all for Downloading this Map.Leave a Feedback here if you want over what you thoughts were of this Map.Oh, and excuse me for my Horrible Grammar. I am Dutch.-lRedPosion.
